title: PFE Icon
body: Hello, I still have not gotten the PFE Icon and was just wondering when to expect it by?

replies.body: I don't have it would you be able to check upon this because I have owned pulsefire Ezreal for some time and I have not received the new icon although it is now the 6/11 ?? thank you.
You might find that the poros left a little gift the next time you log in. Be sure to check for that icon ^_^!
Still don't have it would you be able to check upon this because I have owned pulsefire Ezreal for some time and I have not received the new icon although it is now the 30th? thank you.
